job_description: ClearFeed aims to bridge the gap between multiple tools we use at our workplace and make it a lot easier to deal with them. Our small team is based out of Bangalore and welcoming in nature. We are backed by a leading Venture Capital firm and well-known Angels.
skills: Thorough understanding of React.js and its corn.principles.Willingness to learn new frameworks and languages where required.Interest and ability to work across the stack.Familiarity with Server Side Rendering (SSR).Must have good written and oral communication skills, be a fast learner and have the ability to adapt quickly to a fast-paced development environment.

job_description: We offer our Community Builders a wide range of benefits to suit their needs. Opportunity. We have many clients who want more from us than we can currently deliver, which creates a massive opportunity for our community builders. Commission. We are changing the recruitment model and, as part of that, are happy to share more of the pie; we’ll beat your current scheme. Package. Build a package that’s important to you — more holidays, four day weeks, flex hours, etc. We can design the right individual package for the right community builders. Growth. We achieved a seven-figure turnover in year one and expect to triple that in 2022. We’re at the start of the hockey stick. At Transparent, we're committed to being a flexible place to work. We are pushing the boundaries of flexibility in the recruitment space.
skills: next js javascript,react js,Angular and Typescript

job_description: You’ll be part of our Front-end team, where we build the client-side of our web applications by translating UI/UX design wireframes into a user-centric web experience. We advocate for our client's needs and we collaborate with other teams to implement an engaging user interface for our trading platforms.As a Front-end Developer at Deriv, you’ll build powerful front-end systems with an improved user experience for our clients worldwide. You’ll be heavily involved in the design and development phases of our applications as we aim to create the best online trading platform in the industry.

Augmedix is on a mission to help clinicians and patients form a human connection at the point of care without the intrusion of technology. Augmedix’s solutions extract data from natural physician-patient conversations and convert it to medical notes in real time, which are seamlessly transferred to the EHR. To achieve this, the company’s Ambient Automation Platform uses Automated Speech Recognition and Natural Language Processing, supported by medical documentation specialists.

Job Context: Reserveit BD is looking for a responsible iOS Developer for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of IOS devices including mobile phones and tablets. The iOS Developer will work closely with our development team to review, analyze, and evaluate business systems.
skills: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or software engineering. • 1+ year of professional experience in IOS development. • Proficient Swift UI, UI kit, and Objective-C knowledge are preferred. • Extensive experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation. • Knowledge of Apple’s design principles and application interface guidelines. • Proficient in code versioning tools, including GitHub and Bitbucket • Experience with continuous integration and responsive design. • Knowledge of unit testing is a plus. Job Location: Lalmatia, Dhaka Employment Status: Full Time. Salary: Negotiable, depending on experience. Compensation and Other Benefits: As per company policy. Apply Instruction: Please send your CV to “hr@reserveitbd.com” and the subject of your email should be ‘iOS developer’.
